org.bytemechanics.standalone.ignite

Interface Parameter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultParameterContainer

    public interface Parameter
    Interface to implement the parameters definition Tipically this interface is applied to an enumeration
    Author:
    afarre

    • Method Summary

      • getValidation

        default Function<Object,String> getValidation()
        Semantic validation after correct parameters parse is done when the validation method is executed all parameters has its values

      • parseParameter

        default Object parseParameter(String _value)
        Parse the provided value with the given parser supplier
        Parameters:
        _value - value to parse
        Returns:
        parsed value or the same value if no parser provided
        Throws:
        UnparseableParameter - if can not be parsed
